Kongo: Na luyantiku ya mvita, bo vandaka kusala nzietelo mbala mingi na zulu ya nzadi-mungwa, kansi ntangu bo yantikaka kusala radare mpi yo vandaka kusadisa mingi, ba sous-marins kumaka kukwenda na nsi ya masa sambu bo mona bo ve. English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. Kongo: Sambu yo kele na zulu ya ngumba mosi ya norde ya Mecque, dibulu yina kele mpenza na kingenga ya ntoto ya mvimba. English: The first submarine to be built was the German U-boat, which was the first to be sunk by a submarine. Kongo: Sambu yo kele na zulu ya ngumba mosi ya norde ya Mecque, dibulu yina kele Edina na kingenga ya ntoto ya mvimba. English: The first submarine to be built was the German U-boat, which was the first to be sunk by a submarine.
